about_the_game:
Create and sell games, gain fame and wealth, research new technologies, manage taxes and salaries, take loans if needed, and compete with 5000 companies. Experience the thrill of running your own studio in Game Builder Tycoon.




Design standout games by selecting key elements like art, features, quests, dialogue, music, level, and world design. Work solo in the prologue, choose the genre, theme, platform, game size, art style, viewpoint, and features. Launch your game in the market and create sequels. Imagine a platformer game set in a sci-fi world with 2D-pixel art and multiplayer options. The possibilities for customization are endless!




Choose your character and define their role—be it as a coder or an artist. Each character has three attributes: IQ, creativity, and insight, which affect six skills: tech, art, writing, design, music, and marketing. Create a unique character that fits your vision. As you progress, continuously train yourself in various ways to stay ahead in the competitive market.




As your game progresses, research and unlock new elements. Discover new genres like survival or simulation, themes like zombies or pirates, devices like consoles or mobile, game sizes, art styles like semi-realistic or stylized, features like localization or tutorials, viewpoints like isometric or third-person, and marketing strategies like free demos or media advertisements. With over 60 things to unlock, the possibilities are endless to create your next hit games.



Feeling unmotivated? Don't worry, you're competing with 5000 other companies. They are smart and hardworking, just like your team. Create better games and use effective marketing tactics to earn more and stay ahead.



Experience advanced features including hiring systems, new offices, more unlockable features, game publisher mode, longer gameplay, and countless new explorations waiting for you in the full game.
detailed_description:
Create and sell games, gain fame and wealth, research new technologies, manage taxes and salaries, take loans if needed, and compete with 5000 companies. Experience the thrill of running your own studio in Game Builder Tycoon.




Design standout games by selecting key elements like art, features, quests, dialogue, music, level, and world design. Work solo in the prologue, choose the genre, theme, platform, game size, art style, viewpoint, and features. Launch your game in the market and create sequels. Imagine a platformer game set in a sci-fi world with 2D-pixel art and multiplayer options. The possibilities for customization are endless!




Choose your character and define their role—be it as a coder or an artist. Each character has three attributes: IQ, creativity, and insight, which affect six skills: tech, art, writing, design, music, and marketing. Create a unique character that fits your vision. As you progress, continuously train yourself in various ways to stay ahead in the competitive market.




As your game progresses, research and unlock new elements. Discover new genres like survival or simulation, themes like zombies or pirates, devices like consoles or mobile, game sizes, art styles like semi-realistic or stylized, features like localization or tutorials, viewpoints like isometric or third-person, and marketing strategies like free demos or media advertisements. With over 60 things to unlock, the possibilities are endless to create your next hit games.



Feeling unmotivated? Don't worry, you're competing with 5000 other companies. They are smart and hardworking, just like your team. Create better games and use effective marketing tactics to earn more and stay ahead.



Experience advanced features including hiring systems, new offices, more unlockable features, game publisher mode, longer gameplay, and countless new explorations waiting for you in the full game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: No
  • VR Support:
  • Additional Notes: Required minimum 1280 X 720 resolution
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Mint
  • Processor: i3 Quad core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT710 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.11 (El Capitan) or later
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: No
  • Additional Notes: Required minimum 1280 X 720 resolution
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 13
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT710 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Not required
  • VR Support:

pc_requirements.recommended:

  • OS: Window 11
  • Processor: i3 Quad core processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 710 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Game Builder Tycoon - Prologue is a free simulation game in which you begin your journey as an indie game developer. Personalize your character, craft hit games, manage marketing and research stuff. Create best game on the planet!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
